name: Story -> Lesson -> Takeaway
description: Turns a personal experience into a valuable and actionable lesson for the audience.
template: Structure the post around the 'Story -> Lesson -> Takeaway' framework. The Story is a brief, vivid moment. The Lesson is what you learned from that experience. The Takeaway is a simple rule or action that others can apply in their own lives.
